Name: Pieces of Beauty 2
About the game: Appreciate a good time with this japanese themed jigsaw game. Entertain yourself discovering the fabulous style of Ohara Koson, a world-renowned japanese artist of the late 19th and early 20th centuries. Featuring: - New excellent background music added to enrich your gameplay experience - A total of 13 jigsaw puzzles made from 16 amazing prints
